name: Noddle | A game with coins and running
name_original: Noddle | A game with coins and running
description:
You are a runner, born and bred to run. It is your goal to reach the highest score humanly possible whilst grabbing all the coins you can.  Avoid the obstacles and run as fast and far as your feet will take you! 

To exit use the  button found on the menu or press Alt F4.

Controls:

W | Roll Forwards

W & Space | Front Flip

A | slide Left

D | slidel Right

S | slide forward

Space | Jump

power ups include : super jump, super speed, and coin magnet!

(In order to get your highscore to work hit the reset button once after the first game)
